mapper.select: select SERIAL_KEY, TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_NAME, USER_ID, ACTIVE, SEED_COEFF_R, SEED_COEFF_G, SEED_COEFF_B, NOTE, INS_DATE, INS_USER, UPD_DATE, UPD_USER from TEMPLATECHARTCOLOUR order by TEMPLATE_ID

select SERIAL_KEY, TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_NAME, USER_ID, ACTIVE, SEED_COEFF_R, SEED_COEFF_G, SEED_COEFF_B, NOTE, INS_DATE, INS_USER, UPD_DATE, UPD_USER from TEMPLATECHARTCOLOUR where TEMPLATE_ID = #{templateId}
mapper.insert:
insert into TEMPLATECHARTCOLOUR (TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_NAME, USER_ID, ACTIVE, SEED_COEFF_R, SEED_COEFF_G, SEED_COEFF_B, NOTE, INS_DATE, INS_USER, UPD_DATE, UPD_USER) values
(#{tem.templateId}, #{tem.templateName}, #{tem.userId}, #{tem.active}, #{tem.seedCoeffR}, #{tem.seedCoeffG}, #{tem.seedCoeffB}, #{tem.note}, #{tem.insDate}, #{tem.insUser}, #{tem.updDate}, #{tem.updUser})

insert into TEMPLATECHARTCOLOUR (TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_NAME, USER_ID, ACTIVE, SEED_COEFF_R, SEED_COEFF_G, SEED_COEFF_B, NOTE, INS_DATE, INS_USER, UPD_DATE, UPD_USER) values (#{templateId}, #{templateName}, #{userId}, #{active}, #{seedCoeffR}, #{seedCoeffG}, #{seedCoeffB}, #{note}, #{insDate}, #{insUser}, #{updDate}, #{updUser})
mapper.update: update TEMPLATECHARTCOLOUR set TEMPLATE_ID = #{templateId}, TEMPLATE_NAME = #{templateName}, USER_ID = #{userId}, ACTIVE = #{active}, SEED_COEFF_R = #{seedCoeffR}, SEED_COEFF_G = #{seedCoeffG}, SEED_COEFF_B = #{seedCoeffB}, NOTE = #{note}, INS_DATE = #{insDate}, INS_USER = #{insUser}, UPD_DATE = #{updDate}, UPD_USER = #{updUser}

update TEMPLATECHARTCOLOUR set TEMPLATE_ID = #{templateId}, TEMPLATE_NAME = #{templateName}, USER_ID = #{userId}, ACTIVE = #{active}, SEED_COEFF_R = #{seedCoeffR}, SEED_COEFF_G = #{seedCoeffG}, SEED_COEFF_B = #{seedCoeffB}, NOTE = #{note}, INS_DATE = #{insDate}, INS_USER = #{insUser}, UPD_DATE = #{updDate}, UPD_USER = #{updUser} where TEMPLATE_ID = #{templateIdWhere}
update TEMPLATECHARTCOLOUR set ACTIVE = #{active}, TEMPLATE_NAME = #{templateName}, UPD_DATE = #{updDate}, UPD_USER = #{updUser} where TEMPLATE_ID = #{templateIdWhere}
